HELP.LANDING:
are you looking for a quick start?{{emoji}}

`{{prefix}}level`
*You might want to check how much exp you get after those hours of chit-chatting.*

`{{prefix}}balance`
*Come check how many artcoins you had in your wallet right now.*

`{{prefix}}daily`
*Annie rewards you free 250 artcoins for every 23 hours. So, make sure to not skip this freebies!*

`{{prefix}}leaderboard`
*Curious who got the highest exp, artcoins and fame points? then try this!*

`{{prefix}}profile`
*You will be able to see your current rank, level, artcoins and fame points at a glance.*

For comprehensive list, take a look at Commandpedia by pressing the :book: button on this message.

COMMANDPEDIA.USAGE_EXAMPLES: Use **{{prefix}}help <CommandName>** to get information about a command.

LEADERBOARD.GUIDE:
Did you know this guild has its own ranking leaderboard? check out the commands below! {{emoji}}

`{{prefix}}lb exp`
*List of user with highest experience points & level. Their hours of chit-chatting do really pay off.*

`{{prefix}}lb bal`
*List of rich users with the highest balance account. They are either coming from rich family or dedicating their time on grinding coins.*

`{{prefix}}lb fame`
*List of most-loved users with highest popularity of fame points. They are way too fabulous for my taste.*

`{{prefix}}lb art`
*List of most-faved artists with highest engagement artwork across the discord guilds. Artists, unite!*

SETLEVELUPMESSAGE.GUIDE:
Use one of the following action to enable or disable levelup-message module in this guild. {{emoji}}

`{{prefix}}setlvlupmsg enable`
*By enabling this module, your guild will receive levelup message whenever someone is leveling up (obviously).*

`{{prefix}}setlvlupmsg disable`
*Getting tired of annoying level-up message? then it's time to disable it.*

SETLEVELUPMESSAGE.ALREADY_DISABLED: {{emoji}} This module hasn't been enabled yet in this guild.

SETLEVELUPMESSAGE.SUCCESSFULLY_DISABLED: {{emoji}} **Level-up Message Module** has been successfully disabled in this guild!

SETWELCOMER.GUIDE:
Use one of the following action to start setup welcomer module for this guild. {{emoji}}

`{{prefix}}setwelcomer enable`
*One first step you might want to try to make sure this module is enabled in the guild.*

`{{prefix}}setwelcomer channel <targetChannel>`
*Set the target channel where you want the welcomer message to be sent in.*
eg. __{{prefix}}setwelcomer channel #general__

`{{prefix}}setwelcomer text <message>`
*You can make a unique customized welcomer message for this guild. Include {{guild}} or {{user}} for shortcut.*
eg. __{{prefix}}setwelcomer text Hi, cuttie {{user}}!__

`{{prefix}}setwelcomer preview`
*Wanna see how's your welcomer looks like before your comrades see it?*

`{{prefix}}setwelcomer disable`
*Tired of spammy welcomer message? you can disable this module anytime.*
SETWELCOMER.INVALID_ACTION: Sorry, I don't recognize this action in the welcomer module.
SETWELCOMER.SUCCESSFULLY_ENABLED: {{emoji}} **Welcomer Module** has been successfully enabled in this guild!
SETWELCOMER.ALREADY_DISABLED: {{emoji}} This module hasn't been enabled yet in this guild.
SETWELCOMER.SUCCESSFULLY_DISABLED: {{emoji}} **Welcomer Module** has been successfully disabled in this guild!
SETWELCOMER.EMPTY_CHANNEL_PARAMETER: {{emoji}} Don't forget to specify the channel name!
SETWELCOMER.INVALID_CHANNEL: {{emoji}} Sorry, I can't find any channel with that name.
SETWELCOMER.CHANNEL_SUCCESSFULLY_REGISTERED: {{emoji}} Alright! I'll greet user in {{channel}} whenever they joined to this guild!
SETWELCOMER.EMPTY_TEXT_PARAMETER:

STRIKE.GUIDE:
You are authorized to use the **Strike System.**

This feature used to track bad behavior caused by member in the server and automatically give them penalty action such as mute, kick or even ban.
STRIKE.NULL_RECORD: **{{user}}** doesn't have any strike record yet. Please type `+ <reason>` to add new strike.
STRIKE.DISPLAY_RECORD:
Here's what I found for **{{user}}**

Total **{{recordsLength}}** strikes were recorded.
The recent one was added by **{{reportedBy}}**

{{list}}

Type `+ <reason>` to add new strike.
STRIKE.ENTRY_REGISTER: Thankyou! your report for **{{user}}** has been registered.
